description:
You can tell right away from this video that Orlando is a happy guy. He smiles a lot, likes to laugh and was extremely fun to work with.
Though he likes girls with big tits, he seems to be down with doing more with us in the future. He is one of those guys that had the whole "gay for pay" thing laid out, and though hasn't done anything, he thinks he can give or take anything.
We'll see.
But for now, we get to see how he does on his own.
Orlando shows off his fun frisky side in this video, with some charming smiles mixed in with looks that invite you to come suck his dick.
Like I said, he was a joy to work with and to be around, so he is definitely coming back for "more."
title: Orlando - Solo
